H3.text: who performed the halftime show at super bowl 51. Lady Gaga

A4.text: Lady Gaga confirmed that she would be performing at the Super Bowl LI halftime show on her Instagram account

A5.text: Fox Sports president John Entz confirmed Gaga's involvement adding '[She] is one of the most electric performers of our generation, and we couldn't be happier with the choice to have her headline the Super Bowl LI Halftime Show'
